channel.title: I want to do a source change. can someone help?
channel.description: Ok, so we have a ton of people on Allstar-scape V2. I want to switch them all to V1 so I can work on V2. How do I do this? I tried ti and they were on a corrupted version of V2 instead of V1...

item.title: I want to do a source change. can someone help?
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

If u want to work on your server without it happening on your server, just take a copy of your server, change the port on the copy and u can run a test server which u can work on, then when done just replace teh current server files with your new updated ones.

I hope thats what ure trying 2 get at.

Brendan

Read full topic
item.source: I want to do a source change. can someone help?

item.title: I want to do a source change. can someone help?
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Just turn off V2, turn on V1, and ‘code’.

Read full topic
